channel.title: Drewfus Nation Pirate Radio
channel.description: Eclectic mixes from the Drewfus Nation/OS-BMX bretheren. Lots of good music, both old and new, and tales of stupidity and adventure from "back in the day"
channel.copyright: Copyright 2006 Drewfus420 and contributing DJ's, distributed for personal use ONLY.
channel.itunes:author: DJ Drewfus420
channel.itunes:summary: Eclectic mixes from the Drewfus Nation/OS-BMX bretheren. Lots of good music, both old and new, and tales of stupidity and adventure from "back in the day". Punk, pop, new wave, darkwave, reggae, dub, hip hop, electronica and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Cyber-Pirate Radio Stylee!!!

item.title: DNCPR # 25 DB Old School's Hardcore V 2.0
item.description: DJ DB Old School hits us HARD with his 2nd Cyber Pirate mix! 63 minutes of headbanging METAL to put a hurtin' on yer eardrums. Duration:1 hour, 3 minutes, 17 seconds Date Last Updated:Wed 19 Apr 2006 02:38:04 PM CDT File Size:60.75 MB
item.itunes:author: DJ Drewfus420
item.itunes:summary: DJ DB Old School hits us HARD with his 2nd Cyber Pirate mix! 63 minutes of headbanging METAL to put a hurtin' on yer eardrums. Duration:1 hour, 3 minutes, 17 seconds Date Last Updated:Wed 19 Apr 2006 02:38:04 PM CDT File Size:60.75 MB

item.title: DNCPR #24 DJ Diablo 13's Gothcast
item.description:
Special guest mix by DJ Diablo 13 from Staten Isl NY, featuring new and classic gothic club tracks. No intro, no voice over, no playlist, just a little over an hour of tunes that will make you feel like they never closed The Bank (RIP).
Sorry for the delay in shows, expect 2-3 more in the next 2 weeks (reguest line show, DB Old School's Hardcore V2, and more) then prob a short hiatus as I adapt to having a toddler and a newborn early next month.
Enjoy the show, and contact me with questions, playlist details, requests, or to contribute a guest show.
ALSO Please update your RSS feed! I will be dropping this server SOON, so go to http://drewfusnation.libsyn.com/ to get the new RSS feed and check out the new blog page!
Drewfus Duration:57 minutes, 6 seconds Date Last Updated:Thu 06 Apr 2006 12:25:59 PM CDT File Size:54.82 MB

item.title: DNCPR 23b more fun punk
item.description: more fun punk from the likes of Screaching Weasel, The Queers, and Mr. T Experience. Enjoy, DJ Drewfus 420

item.title: DNCPR 23a fun punk
item.description: Remember when ya didn't have to be angry to be punk? These bands all make fun punk rock, and you need to hear it!
item.itunes:author: DJ Drewfus420
item.itunes:summary: Remember when ya didn't have to be angry to be punk? These bands all make fun punk rock, and you need to hear it!

item.title: Drewfus Nation Cyber-Pirate Radio 21 DJ Plux
item.description: Metal up yer ass!!! Guest mix by OS-BMX.com member and Joisey native Plux. 10 kick ass metal tracks interspersed with some inane stage banter from Cronos from Venom. Bang that head that doesn't bang, if it 's too loud, your too old! Enjoy! -Drewfus Duration:47 minutes, 33 seconds Date Last Updated:Fri 20 Jan 2006 12:17:39 AM CST File Size:45.65 MB

item.title: **D Nation Cyber-Pirate Radio 20 Knifegirl's Psych mix**
item.description: Guest selector DJ Knifegirl from straight out the Garden State hits you with 24 Psych-Rock tracks to melt your mind. item.title: **D Nation Cyber-Pirate Radio 19**
item.description: Quincy Punk Rules! Everyones favorite M.E. adds comentary to this mix of 20 classic 1980's Punk Rock. 2 songs each from: Bad Religon 7 Seconds Black Flag Circle Jerks Husker Du Bad Brains Minor Threat T.S.O.L. item.title: D Nation Cyber Pirate Radio 17 DJ DBOldschool
item.description: Guest selector DJ DB Old School comes correct with some New Years mayhem fo' ya, HARDCORE stylee! An hour plus of mid and new school metal and industrial to get your blood pumping.
